wikipedia_page.main: Paul Victor Heffer (born 21 December 1947) is an English former footballer who played as a defender for West Ham United.

response: He later returned to West Ham to become player-manager of the A team assisting the development of players such as Harry Redknapp, John Charles and Paul Heffer. He moved to Millwall in 1968, where he worked under ex-Hammer Ben Fenton. Barrett died in 2014, aged 83.
